title: _act_
author: _act_
content: I want to know your opinion about filecoin, this coin was created in 2017 if I guess right, it got to $238 in 2021 which was the ATH. As of today, the price is back to $4.5. That was a huge price drop, but I like the saying that a drop in price of a coin is an opportunity to buy, this is true for bitcoin because bitcoin will attain ATH, but not all altcoins were about to attain ATH. With what I am seeing about filecoin, I am thinking it can get to that price again which would be a huge opportunity, but I do not know much about the coin. Anyone that knows more about this coin can post here to let me know if the coin is worth going for or not. Thanks in advance.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Here is, in my opinions a well written article, explaining in details what filecoin performs and what problems it aims to solve : data storage, censorship, store and distribution of "humanity most valuable informations" ( as they claim)."In essence, Filecoin’s IPFS system uses a peer-to-peer network to separate data from existing corporate control and possible censorship."source : https://dailycoin.com/filecoin/

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: As I said earlier, most of the alternative currencies fail to reach their previous highs, so do not try to build a future strategy based on these assumptions related to previous prices.Filecoin project was promising in the past, but the market requirements are changing now, and therefore it may not succeed in reaching those heights, just as what the market wants in the year 2024 is different from the current need.The best advice now is to invest only 10% of the money allocated to digital currencies in altcoins and focus on Bitcoin.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: For a currency which has already hit 238$ to hit 4,50$ is a very bad sign, despite being in a bearish market. For me it's a clear indicative filecoin's proposal has failed. It didn't inspire investors purchasing the idea of decentralized virtual storage. Probably people feel confortable with the traditional means of storing file that they saw no reason to adopt a new cryptocurrency for that. And it's understandable because there are many ways to store files online or offline in relatively safe ways.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: uneng on December 10, 2022, 01:01:49 PMIt didn't inspire investors purchasing the idea of decentralized virtual storage. Probably people feel confortable with the traditional means of storing file that they saw no reason to adopt a new cryptocurrency for that. And it's understandable because there are many ways to store files online or offline in relatively safe ways.I think NFT has succeeded in stealing the spotlight from all the advantages that cryptocurrencies can offer, and the advantage of centralized storage has not gained importance because cloud storage and other current methods work very efficiently and without problems, at least for the time being.No one knows what will happen in the future, but I agree with you that it is a negative sign.

Although they are obsolet, there is still people using them to protect more private and exclusive files, fearing they can be leaked if stored online. A desktop or laptop without internet access are also alternatives.

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: Filecoin is one of the best cryptoprojects out there. It is a crypto solution that allows for decentralized cooperative storage systems to work as well as it also provides a decentralized payment network.  The idea of decentralized storage is something that is pretty much related to the initial Satosi's view for a decentralized world.I believe that it is an amazing project that will bring a lot profit to many people.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: What does it offer that other coins fail to give? How is it unique in any way while still offering a useful utility to people? Where does its value lie? Is it another one of those coins that perform better just because bitcoin, its direct counterpart, performs well? There are a lot of things to consider when trying to find a piece of gem in the cryptocurrency pile of junk. You have to think of a lot of things if you really want to get the most out of your investment. Not everything that once rose to the top has actual value within them.
